name: Task Management Application
description: A web application for users to manage their tasks effectively with synchronization and real-time updates.

User profile page for account settings and logout.

components.name: Header
components.description: Header with navigation links and user profile icon.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Footer with contact information and links.

components.name: LandingPageContent
components.description: Welcome content for the landing page.

components.name: TaskList
components.description: List of tasks for the user.

components.description: Sidebar to filter tasks based on categories.

database.name: users
database.schema: CREATE TABLE users ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() );

database.name: tasks
database.schema: CREATE TABLE tasks ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, due_date TIMESTAMP, priority VARCHAR(50), is_completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() );

database.name: categories
database.schema: CREATE TABLE categories ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL );

database.name: task_categories
database.schema: CREATE TABLE task_categories ( task_id INT REFERENCES tasks(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, category_id INT REFERENCES categories(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (task_id, category_id) );

database.name: shared_tasks
database.schema: CREATE TABLE shared_tasks ( task_id INT REFERENCES tasks(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, shared_with INT REFERENCES users(id), PRIMARY KEY (task_id, shared_with) );
